entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as someone who is known to be traveling with 'arry Potter.' and his scar burned in the silence.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is a Snatcher who crouched down in front of Hermione and repeated what he knew about Harry Potter.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one whose picture looks like her according to Greyback.

relationships.description: Greyback knew that Harry Potter was traveling with 'arry Potter.
Greyback crouched down in front of Hermione and showed her the picture.
